game.name: Perikoto
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Tracked Controller Support, VR Only, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Discover the unending winter of Perikoto in this short VR horror adventure. Strange beings skulk in the woods, the crows are restless, and you have no place to call home. Where will you wander?
